description:
I've worked with hundreds and hundreds of guys and it's funny how personalities completely run the spectrum.
Some guys are shy, some are cocky, some are funny, and some are charming. It's kind of like no two snowflakes ever being the same.
Doug falls under the "funny" and "cocky" categories, and Harley falls under "funny" and "charming." So they're both really funny!
I knew when we got them together that it was going to be comedic. And it was. My sides were hurting from all the laughing we did.
Of course, it was really sexy, too. Harley is one of my favorites and Doug has become a rising "star" with his openness to new experiences and his ability to fuck like nothing else...
title: Doug & Harley
